citations.narrative:
There is an accumulation of dirt, excess food debris and excreta between the wire mesh and the wall on the back side of
the bat enclosure. This accumulation needs to be removed more frequently to reduce this accumulation, odors and
minimize disease hazards. This needs to be addressed for the health of the animals.
Correct by: July 20, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.131(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
There is an accumulation of dirt, excess food debris and excreta between the wire mesh and the wall on the back side of 
the bat enclosure. This accumulation needs to be removed more frequently to reduce this accumulation, odors and 
minimize disease hazards. This needs to be addressed for the health of the animals.  
Correct by: July 20, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
